intro: Drimyspermum urens, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Myrtaceae and is characterized by its dark green, velvety leaves. The plant produces small, white to pinkish flowers that are often clustered together. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and streambanks. Drimyspermum urens is known for its aromatic foliage and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
